FishFinder.name: Burke Lake Park
FishFinder.description: A lake surrounded with a fishing shoreline of 5.25 miles and a trail that loops around the lake starting at the parking lot.

FishFinder.name: Claytor Lake State Park
FishFinder.description: Known for sport fishing and boating, the park has a full-service marina with docking slips, boat rentals, and refreshments
FishFinder.fish: Small and Largemouth bass, Spotted Bass, Hybrid Striped Bass

FishFinder.name: Douthat State Park
FishFinder.description: A family park listed on the Natinal Register of Historic Places. Visitors can enjoy interpretive programs, a 43 mile hiking trail, mountain biking, and picnic areas.
FishFinder.fish: Rainbow Trout, Brown Trout, and Brook Trout.

FishFinder.name: Hungry Mother State Park
FishFinder.description: One of the original six Virginia State Parks, Hungry Mother is known for beautiful woodlands and the 108 acre lake in the heart.

FishFinder.name: Smith Mountain Lake State Park
FishFinder.description: Second largest freshwater lake in the state, this park contains a large amount of water activities such as swimming, boat rentals and a fishing pier.
